impact.heading: Empowering Muslim Youth in Hungary
impact.description: Building community, opportunities, and meaningful impact through engagement and support.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Creating unity, friendships, and lifelong bonds.

education.title: Education
education.desc: Workshops, study groups, and skill-building sessions.

support.title: Support
support.desc: A welcoming environment for students & newcomers.

events.title: Events
events.desc: Small & large gatherings to connect Muslim youth.

description.intro: MIT is a student-run community built to support Muslim students in Hungary, help them connect, grow, and feel at home.
description.activities: We organize events, gatherings, study sessions, charity activities, and spiritual programs — all in a positive, respectful, and welcoming environment.
